resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/399548577</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>399548577</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Micro-ondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Microondas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Microonde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροκύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microondas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How do microwaves heat up your coffee? Adjust the frequency and amplitude of microwaves. Watch water molecules rotating and bouncing around. View the microwave field as a wave, a single line of vectors, or the entire field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie up Mikrowellen Hitze Ihren Kaffee? 
Justieren Sie die Frequenz und den Umfang von Mikrowellen. 
Überwachen Sie Wassermoleküle, herum sich zu drehen und 
aufzuprallen. Sehen Sie die Mikrowelle auffangen als 
Welle, eine einzelne Zeile von Vektoren an, oder die gesamten 
fangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment la chaleur de micro-ondes lèvent-elles 
votre café ? Ajustez la fréquence et l'amplitude de 
micro-ondes. Observez les molécules d'eau tourner et rebondir 
autour. Visualisez la zone de micro-onde comme vague, une ligne 
simple des vecteurs, ou la zone entière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o calor das microondas levanta seu café? 
Ajuste a freqüência e a amplitude das microondas. Preste
atenção a moléculas de água girar e saltar ao redor. Veja o 
campo da microonda como uma onda, uma única linha dos vetores, ou o 
campo inteiro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come il calore di microonde aumenta il vostro 
caffè? Registri la frequenza e l'ampiezza delle microonde. 
Guardi le molecole di acqua ruotare e rimbalzare intorno. 
Osservi il campo di microonda come onda, una singola riga dei 
vettori, o l'intero campo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα μικροκύματα θερμαίνουν επάνω τον καφέ σας; 
Ρυθμίστε τη συχνότητα και το εύρος των μικροκυμάτων. 
Προσέξτε τα μόρια ύδατος και γύρω. Εμφανίστε το 
πεδίο μικροκυμάτων ως κύμα, μια ενιαία γραμμή διανυσμάτων, ή το
ολόκληρο πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo el calor de las microondas sube su café? 
Ajuste la frecuencia y la amplitud de microondas. Mire las
moléculas de agua el rotar y el despedir alrededor. Opinión el
campo de la microonda como onda, una sola línea de vectores, o el 
campo entero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>399548577</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/microwaves</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
